      • extractOneAugmentLine

        public static void extractOneAugmentLine(Interpreter interp,
                                         java.sql.Connection conn,
                                         java.lang.String line,
                                         int limit,
                                         java.lang.String file,
                                         int linenum)
        Take one line of plan text, parse it into dependencies augmented by the semantic rewriting system and add indexes for the raw tokens and the tokens in the dependency parse into the database. The DB tables are content - the sentence and its dependency parse index - tokens and the sentences in which they are found depindex - tokens and the dependencies in which they are found counts - the number of occurrences of a token, used to order joins

      • storeCorpusText

        public static void storeCorpusText(java.sql.Connection conn)

      • storeDocCorpusText

        public static void storeDocCorpusText(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> docs)
        Parameters:
        docs - Key is filename, value is a list of lines of text. Sentences must not cross a line.
